'''Genshin Impact Fan Art Program 2022''' is [[Web Event]] in [[Version 2.4]].

Hello, Travelers~<br />
Today, Mimo brings you some important news:<br />
In this broadcast, they have invited a lot of outstanding creators to celebrate the arrival of 2022 with everyone~

==Broadcast==
Broadcast Time: January 21, 2022 21:00(UTC+8)<br />
Broadcast Link: https://www.youtube.com/c/HoYoLAB/featured

==Event 1: Forum Event==
===Event Duration===
January 15, 2022 – January 21, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)

===How to Participate===
Reply to [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/1943442 this post] about your precious memories in Teyvat in 2021 to enter the lucky draw.

===Event Rewards===
They will randomly select 50 participants, each of whom will receive a Genshin Impact Character Stand (Random Character).

Besides these 50 lucky users, Mimo will also be giving away one Trick-or-Treat Party-themed Merchandise Set (Random Character) for the users that left Comments 121,  2,022, and 22,121 respectively.

==Event 2: Topic Event==
===Event Duration===
January 21, 2022 – January 23, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)

===How to Participate===
During the event, post a discussion thread related to this broadcast under the category of Genshin Impact > Game Discussion, with the topic #Fan Art Program to enter the lucky draw.

===Event Rewards===
They will randomly select 5 participants, each of whom will receive a Paimon Figure.
The prize draw for the two events listed above will be on January 28. The Winners List will be updated in [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/1943442 this post] at that time.

===Notes===
# Travelers, please pay attention to System Messages to fill out your shipping address. Prize-winners who have not provided their address within one month after the system message is sent will be deemed to have voluntarily forfeited their prizes.
# Each user has only one chance to win a prize in the same event. If the winning comment left by the user is invalid, the prize will be awarded directly to the next comment. The prizes for the two events are awarded independently of each other.
# The following situations will be considered invalid participation:
## Replying to a comment on the post (instead of commenting directly to the post itself), meaningless comments that only include punctuation marks, emojis, etc.
## Content that does not relate to the current event
## Plagiarism or publishing content that violates our Community Rules
## Works that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game and its characters

Thanks to Dr. k for the beautiful artwork!
